## For Students:

This website is a directory for free and open source swirl courses. You can
browse available courses by the name of the course or by the name of the author
of the course. Click "Browse Courses" above to start browsing!

---

## For swirl Course Authors:

Adding your course to the Swirl Course Network offers several advantages:

- Students can discover your course more easily.
- Your course can in installed with the `install_course()` function.
- Team swirl can more easily provide support for your course.

Click [here]() to learn how to share your course on the Swirl Course Network.
